str2: From salos; to waver, i.e. Agitate, rock, topple or destroy; figuratively, to disturb, incite.

str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
